briefdescription.para: str2int used in the switch case, it allows to convert in compile time strings to int

parameterdescription.para: is the index of the string to start with

simplesect.para: an integer that correspond to the string

briefdescription.para: dynamic_graph::Device::CLASS_NAME must be the name as the actual device class.
